title: Muthoot Finance shares may rally 26%, brokerages bullish, say ‘buy’ this NBFC stock - The Financial Express
content: Muthoot Finance shares may rally 26%, brokerages bullish, say ‘buy’ this NBFC stock  The Financial Express
description: Muthoot Finance is Motilal Oswal's top stock pick among lending NBFCs, given strong execution track record of the management and the next generation of the family being groomed to take up leadership positions in the future.
